title: Fuck this Dogshit ranked system
body:
What the fuck is the point of starting accounts in fucking iron while my fucking MMR is having me play against high gold and low plat!
Then as the early win streaks to inflate my mmr dies off my mmr tanks on losses and starts matching me with fking silver players,
 and i get stuck in dogshit coinflip games.
What the actual fuck is this stupid matchmaking!?
